hourly rate set in the employment contract is based on the agreed working conditions and is calculated by dividing the monthly salary from the job offer set in USD by 184 hours (the maximum possible monthly norm of hours when working on a 5-day 8-hour working week in a month in which it can be 23 working days: 23*8=184). Further, the result should be converted into KZT using the official KZT/USD exchange rate at the date of the employment contract. Finally, 0.85 coefficient should be
